publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4571 Ms Rosemary Byrne: The Importance of Modern Studies in Education—That the Parliament acknowledges the importance of modern studies in the secondary school curriculum; believes that modern studies provides an essential element of young people’s awareness and understanding of citizenship, politics, global issues and the many dimensions of poverty, justice and peace in the world, and agrees that modern studies should continue to be taught in S1 and S2 and be provided as an option for Standard Grade and Higher Still courses.
